txt.en: Complete the quest 'Song of the Hopeful Heart'
With the Resolve-watcher's greater vigilance, you will prove a greater boon to your companions' morale in a prolonged fight, allowing the most difficult of challenges to be overcome.

You have begun to follow the Path of the Resolve-watcher. If you follow this path to its end, you will be better able to aid your companions in a prolonged fight, giving them the resolve necessary to meet the challenge they are facing.
Completed the quest 'Song of the Hopeful Heart'
Begin down the Path of the Resolve-watcher
There are many challenges on along the path of the Watcher of Resolve. Taking the first step may be the hardest...
